project.name: MapComplete Governmental Offices
project.description: On this map, Governmental offices are shown and can be easily added

tags.description: The MapComplete theme Governmental Offices has a layer governments showing features with this tag

The layer 'governments allows to upload images and adds them under the 'image'-tag (and image:0, image:1, ... for multiple images). Furhtermore, this layer shows images based on the keys image, wikidata, wikipedia, wikimedia_commons and mapillary

The layer 'governments allows to upload images and adds them under the 'image'-tag (and image:0, image:1, ... for multiple images). Furhtermore, this layer shows images based on the keys image, wikidata, wikipedia, wikimedia_commons and mapillary

The layer 'governments allows to upload images and adds them under the 'image'-tag (and image:0, image:1, ... for multiple images). Furhtermore, this layer shows images based on the keys image, wikidata, wikipedia, wikimedia_commons and mapillary

The layer 'governments allows to upload images and adds them under the 'image'-tag (and image:0, image:1, ... for multiple images). Furhtermore, this layer shows images based on the keys image, wikidata, wikipedia, wikimedia_commons and mapillary
Layer 'governments' shows and asks freeform values for key 'phone' (in the MapComplete.osm.be theme 'Governmental Offices')
Layer 'governments' shows contact:phone~^..*$ with a fixed text, namely '{contact:phone}' (in the MapComplete.osm.be theme 'Governmental Offices')
Layer 'governments' shows and asks freeform values for key 'email' (in the MapComplete.osm.be theme 'Governmental Offices')
Layer 'governments' shows contact:email~^..*$ with a fixed text, namely '{contact:email}' (in the MapComplete.osm.be theme 'Governmental Offices')
Layer 'governments' shows and asks freeform values for key 'website' (in the MapComplete.osm.be theme 'Governmental Offices')
Layer 'governments' shows contact:website~^..*$ with a fixed text, namely '{contact:website}' (in the MapComplete.osm.be theme 'Governmental Offices')
Layer 'governments' shows and asks freeform values for key 'name' (in the MapComplete.osm.be theme 'Governmental Offices')
